name: Blush is Life Baked Talc-Free Dimensional + Brightening Blush
about: What it is: A clean, silky smooth talc-free powder blush baked with squalane and hyaluronic acid in dimensional color duos for a healthy flush of color...Highlighted Ingredients: - Squalane and Hyaluronic Acid: Hydrate and balance...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: These blush shades are baked and swirled with two different tones to create alive, easy-to-wear colors. The soft, smooth powder melts into skin and blends seamlessly for a skin-like, radiant finish so there are no harsh lines. It's buildable, longwearing color you can't mess up...Clinical Results: In a consumer perception study of 33 women:.- 100% agreed this blush is super easy to wear, makes me look healthier.- 100% agreed this blush is easily blendable, glides on smoothly and evenly, and melts into skin.- 100% agreed this blush is weightless and feels silky smooth..Clean.Our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing effectiveness.
ingredients: -Squalane and Hyaluronic Acid: Hydrate and balance...Mica, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Kaolin, Squalane, Jojoba Esters, Octyldodecanol, Hectorite, Silica, Ethylhexylglycerin, Aluminum Hydroxide, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Potassium Sorbate, Tin Oxide, Tocopherol [+/-: CI 15850 (Red 7 Lake), CI 45410 (Red 27 Lake), CI 77007 (Ultramarines), CI 77163 (Bismuth Oxychloride), CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 (Iron Oxides), CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide)]...The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Lightly swirl your brush, then tap off any excess before sweeping it onto the skin. .-Start with a small amount, then build to your desired intensity.
